name: Computer Virus Simulator (Read description)
description:
Ok, its a virus. But its nothing that will steal your info, or make the pc (or whatever u play on) Unusable, just use task manager, find the file, right click, then click stop. This was tested 2 make sure it could be stopped at any time.

Actually, it might open up random windows as well, so maybe you should use a sandbox to test it more than i did. I tested it for 1 minute, so could u guys test the rest of the time for me?

And if a YouTuber try's this, please copy the link to the video in the comments below, and don't forget to credit me for the ga- No, VIRUS.
